1: <error-prone><error-prone>ci 'dod 'dod pa bya ba yis//kun bzang kun byed de bzhin te//langs pa'am ni 'dug pa'am//'gro ba yis sam 'greng ba'am//bzhad pa dang ni smra ba la//gang dang de ru ci de bzhin//gang</error-prone></error-prone>
2: gang dbang po'i las nyid pas//gang gang de de'i rang bzhin du//rang gi mnyam <error-prone>gzhag</error-prone> med <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> bas//rang gis rig pa'i <error-prone>lha</error-prone> 'dren no//de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni//thams cad kho na 'grub pa'o//
3: sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni//rtag tu mthong na rab tu 'grub//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas <error-prone>klog/de</error-prone> ni nyes pa <error-prone>rnam grol</error-prone> te//dngos grub <error-prone>thams</error-prone>
4: cad dbang phyug <error-prone>'gyur//sangs</error-prone> <error-prone>rgyas</error-prone> thams cad dang mnyam par <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> ba mkha' <error-prone>'gro ma</error-prone> sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi <error-prone>shu rtsa</error-prone> gnyis pa'o////
5: de ltar sna tshogs rjes su chags pa'o//dga' ba pad+ma rnam dag che ba <error-prone>yis//gsal</error-prone> bar <error-prone>rjes</error-prone> su gtsang <error-prone>ba dam</error-prone> pa rtag par sbyin pa yis//dam pa bde ba'i dngos <error-prone>pos</error-prone> dam tshig bdag la bde <error-prone>ba</error-prone>
6: rjes su <error-prone>bsgrub//dam</error-prone> pa'i dga' ba shin tu <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> ba skal bzang <error-prone>dam pa</error-prone> <error-prone>shin</error-prone> tu dga'//rang bzhin <error-prone>gyis</error-prone> ni rang bzhin dag <error-prone>pa rtag</error-prone> tu rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos//dam pa dga' ba
7: la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzang <error-prone>dam pa</error-prone> <error-prone>shin</error-prone> tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub pa'o//dag pa rjes su <error-prone>'grub</error-prone> pa'i rang bzhin kho na so so rjes su grub pa bde ba las <error-prone>dam</error-prone> pa'i gsang <error-prone>chen</error-prone> rgyud
8: phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di yongs su rdzogs <error-prone>so////bdag</error-prone> gi 'di ni dang ba'i snying po <error-prone>mchog/bde</error-prone> <error-prone>ba</error-prone> chen po mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu <error-prone>chen</error-prone> po//kun mchog <error-prone>'byung</error-prone> ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi
